channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook - Converted role: The Evil Chef
channel.description:
The Cook [Support] - Optional Additional Info Here
Day Ability 1: Touch of Ladle 1 time usage: Make a random person eat their meal in your kitchen, preventing them to take any actions the next night.
Day Ability 2 (Optional): TODO
Night Ability 1: Scents, unlimited usage Let your cooking talent smell through the castle, preventing a person of your choice to visit anyone that night.
Night Ability 2 (Optional) Finishing Touch, 3 times usage Overcook someones meal, preventing them to talk the next day.
Lore: Every castle has a cook, a specialized Chef that knows how to prepare any kind of meal ... even bad ones. Hired by the King himself for his quality cooking and making the whole castle smell delightful when he's busy preparing dinner.
Comments: Work in progress, I'd be very happy if people had suggestions!
The Evil Chef [Support] (When converted to the Unseen) Day Ability 1: Touch of Ladle, 1 time usage Make a random person eat their meal in your kitchen, preventing them to take any actions the next night.
Night Ability 1: Scents, unlimited usage Let your cooking talent smell through the castle, preventing a person of your choice to visit anyone that night. (Does not prevent Prince execution)
Night Ability 2: Proper preparation, 2 times usage Serve your fellow Unseen members a high quality meal, making their actions always succeed. (Does not work when a target is jailed)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Cook - Converted role: The Evil Chef
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Nylez:

Especially when you’re nearing the end of the game it could win BD the game

or lose BD the game. Assuming this ability will always be successfully used on Scum doesn’t allow for proper balance theory.

This is why Black Wine was removed – It helped Scum have a reason not to talk. Giving Scum an alibi to not defend themselves actually assists them.

item.dc:creator: Nylez
item.description:
Especially when you’re nearing the end of the game it could win BD the game if someone suspect can’t defend themselves from being accused of treason. I’ve seen many situations where Unseen wins because they can easily just defend themselves as everyone suspects everyone in the lategame. And it’s only a Support role, I don’t think the abilities should ALWAYS be useful.
